{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=EW-7428HCn |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B009X0FFNU |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/18/2012 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point,extender |fcc_id=NDD9574281201 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1606EM2I-12G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5SV8M16HS-6K |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Edimax |default_ssid_regex=^Edimax$ |default_ip=192.168.2.2 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''N300 High Power Ceiling Mount Wireless PoE Range Extender / Access Point''
[http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=453&pl1_id=1&pl2_id=5 Product page] :[http://www.edimax.com/images/Image/manual/Wireless/EW-7428HCn/EW-7428HCn_Manualv1.4.pdf Manual] The FCC test report lists the following additional models as covered by this FCC ID.. *Edimax EW-7428HCn, EW-7428ACn, GAP-428HCn *LogiLink WL0130 *Hawking HWABN25 Default credentials are per '''Edimax''''s manual. :The default SSID would appear to be '''Edimax'''. Possible 80:1F:02 OUI... ==Images== Image:EW-7428HCn_1.png|top, angled Image:EW-7428HCn_2.png|bottom, angled Image:EW-7428HCn_back.png|back, ports Image:EW-7428HCn_ceiling_mounted.png|mounted [[Has images::external| ]]
